amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress regarding sewage treatment along the border between the United States and Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, no. 33, printed in Part B, H.Rept. 106-235 to express the Sense of Congress regarding an agreement between the United States and Mexico which will provide for a solution to eliminate the sewage pollution of the San Diego and Tijuana border region.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bilbray amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 427 - 0 (Roll no. 327).
